DOC.brief_summary: A randomize , multicentre , phase III study compare conventional radiotherapy ( 1x8Gy ) stereotactic radiotherapy ( 1x20Gy ) pain reduction quality life spinal metastasis .
DOC.brief_title: Conventional With Stereotactic Radiotherapy Pain Reduction Quality Life Spinal Metastases
DOC.detailed_description: Study population : patient painful spinal metastasis solid tumor without spinal cord compression cord instability . Objective : This study test hypothesis stereotactic radiotherapy give well longer lasting reduction pain , local control therewith well quality life . This order optimize individualize treatment option patient . Study design : Complaints due pain analyse use validated Dutch Brief Pain Inventory ( BPI ) side-effects record use Common Toxicity Criteria Adverse Events ( CTCAE ) . In addition quality life analyse use EORTC QOL-C15-PAL EORTC QLQ-BM22 questionnaire . For analysis cost-effectiveness EQ-5D use .
